Title: Court of Savantae's Data Chip
Text:
＞＞＞CSC Labs Record No.
In AL103, an unknown creature was excavated from the ruins of Mt. Firmament, resembling a divine dragon, with unknown life signs, codenamed "Sentinel".
All types of Sensor tests failed to detect its internal organs, suspected to be ■■■■■■■.
In AL106, Sentinel was awakened by ■■■■■■, and possessed biological intelligence and could communicate. Commander-in-Chief Nine Entropy has a smooth conversation with him and formulates a plan for a True Dragon counterattack, ushering in an important turn in the Threnodian War.
In AL107, Sentinel assisted the humans to shoot down Crownless in Norfall Barrens, and was suspected to have the ability to absorb Threnodian power. Analysis of battlefield energy residue reveals the possibility of ■■■■ existence.
